author: antero_de_frias_moreira
post: To Daveb of Wellington My sincere congratulations on your always excellent comments. You wrote «…I suspect that C 14 testing has not yet advanced to the stage whereby smallgrains such as pollen dust can be reliably dated.» I suggest you to read the interesting proposal of Dr. Stephen Jones http://www.shroud.com/pdfs/n66part6.pdf regards Antero de Frias Moreira ( Centro Português de Sindonologia).
title: Paper Chase:  Z Twist Again
